subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Lakers forward Lamar Odom, who was working toward an All-Star season when he sprained his right knee Dec. 12,  lost his 6½-month-old son, Jayden, to sudden infant death syndrome in June.
snippet: Lakers forward Lamar Odom, who was working toward an All-Star season when he sprained his right knee Dec. 12,  lost his 6½-month-old son, Jayden, to sudden infant death syndrome in June.
